title: Can't switch to other mailserver, error Unable to open a realm at path '/data/data/im.status.ethereum/files/new-account':
body:
### Description 
Android only: If try to switch to mailserver B in Offline messages settings then error popup ` Unable to open a realm at path '/data/data/im.status.ethereum/files/new-account': Not a Realm file.` is shown after confirmation.

on iOS after user confirms switching, Sign in to Status screen is shown

```
*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: 
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: NAME: "Error"
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: Unable to open a realm at path '/data/data/im.status.ethereum/files/new-account': Not a Realm file.
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: 
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: schemaVersion@[native code]

00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: open_migrated_realm@index.android.bundle:12:5316700

00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:3937289
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_fsm_trigger$arity$3@index.android.bundle:12:3941500
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:3934055
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:32:1369
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: x@index.android.bundle:32:643
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: callTimers@index.android.bundle:32:2788
00:28 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:3582

```

 If close the popup then mailserver B is shown as active. If send text message in 1:1 chat then error `Cannot access realm that has been closed.`

```
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: NAME: "Error"
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: Cannot access realm that has been closed.
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: 
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: objects@[native code]
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: get_by_fields@index.android.bundle:12:5334988
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: exists_QMARK_@index.android.bundle:12:5335434
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: exists_QMARK_@index.android.bundle:12:6590048
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:6595007
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:5298803

00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: run_state_machine@index.android.bundle:12:5041645

00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: x@index.android.bundle:32:643
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: k@index.android.bundle:32:1007
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: callImmediates@index.android.bundle:32:3188
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:3183
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:27:1516
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:3009

00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code]
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:1094
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code]
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: 
00:32 I/ReactNativeJS: ***
```


#### Expected behavior

Can switch to other mailserver and no errors are shown
#### Actual behavior
errors when switching to other mailserver and error when sending messages in chat

### Reproduction
https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/8233339/sessions/29/?accessToken=PQbCJrCsQytUTPG7PREi0tM5wUA
- Open Status (on Ropsten with upstream RPC network)
- Open Profile -> Advanced -> Offline messages 
- tap on Status testnet mailserver B
- tap on Confirm in the popup Connect to Status testnet mailserver B?


### Additional Information
* Status version: nightly build May 6
* Operating System: Android
